topic.title: HPE Helion 2.0 Development Platform: ALS Command Reference: Feature Flags

ul.li: helion disable-feature-flag: Deactivate the specified feature.
helion enable-feature-flag: Activate the specified feature.
helion feature-flag: Show the details of the specified feature flag.
helion feature-flags: Show all known feature flags and the status of each one.

section.title: Syntax
section.p: For more information, use the helion help or helion help [command] commands.

row.entry: --target
The once-off target to use for the current operation.
--token
The once-off authentication token to use for the current operation.
--token-file
Path to an existing and readable file containing the targets and authorization tokens.
